participant_1.background:
I once wrote a song about a local legend in my town and got to perform it at the local music festival.
I don't have time for pets, but I love tending to my flower beds.
I met my husband at a dog park and we fell in love over our shared love of animals.
I wash my clothes when I have to.
My comic book collection was stolen from my apartment when I was away on vacation.

participant_2.background:
I play in a band that my parents don't know about.
I love learning about my heritage and the Greek culture.
I like to garden and grow sunflowers.
I practice yoga and meditation to keep fit and calm my mind.
i work out every other day.

content.text: I am looking to learn more about the Greek culture. Do you have any experience with it?
Yes I do! I love learning about my heritage and the Greek culture.
That is awesome! What is your favorite thing about it?
I love learning about the history and the mythology.
I have always been fascinated by Greek mythology. It is so rich and complex.
Yes, it is! I also love the art and architecture of Greece.
Those are two of my favorite things about Greece as well. I love the way the ancient Greeks used nature in their art and architecture.
I agree! It is so beautiful and inspiring.
I would love to visit Greece one day. I have heard that it is a beautiful country.
It is! You should definitely go if you ever get the chance.
Great! I hope you have a great time.
Thank you! I am sure I will.
